ygData.subject: Problems with embedded flv file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have strange problem with embedded video file. Even though the URL is listed in the  attributes, heritrix can not find URI of the FLV file.

Hi all,

I have strange problem with embedded video file. Even though the U=
RL is

V file.

The problem is for example on this page:

http://intermedia.ffa.vu=
tbr.cz/alta-a-omega-3

And the part of the code I am concerned about is:

.vutbr.cz/files/"
allowfullscreen=3D"true" salign=3D"tl"

ptions=3Dtrue&usefullscreen=3Dtrue&usekeys=3Dtrue&showdigits=3D=

http://intermedia.ffa.vutbr.cz/files/flash/vanek-traile=
r.flv"

</object>

In attachment is actual order.xml file and I am using Heritrix 1.14.4, wit=
h
every possible Extractor module.

Do you have any idea why Heritrix could=
 not find that URI?
